Cockpit v2.0 is Now Available!

We are thrilled to announce the release of Cockpit v2.0! You can find all the details and get started by visiting cockpit.lol.

Important Notice for Legacy Users

With the release of Cockpit v2.0, Cockpit 1.0 (now referred to as Legacy) will no longer be supported. This means that no further updates will be coming for the Legacy version. To show our appreciation to our loyal users, we are offering a special discount. If you purchased the Legacy version, you can use the code THANKS15 to get 15% off on your upgrade to Cockpit v2.0.

What’s New in Cockpit v2.0?

Cockpit v2.0 is packed with new features and improvements designed to enhance your experience. Checkout the demo here.

Why Upgrade to Cockpit v2.0?

Cockpit v2.0 offers a range of new features and improvements that make it a must-have upgrade for any user:

  • Completely Redesigned UI: A fresh, modern look that’s intuitive and user-friendly.
  • High Performance: Rebuilt from the ground up for speed and reliability.
  • Modular Design: Easily customizable to fit your needs.

How to Get Started

To start using Cockpit v2.0, simply visit cockpit.lol. Don’t forget to use the discount code THANKS15 if you’re upgrading from the Legacy version to enjoy a 15% discount.

Feel free to reach out if you have any questions or need further assistance. Thank you for your continued support and we look forward to providing you with the best possible experience with Cockpit v2.0!
